@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/finalized/.test(baseUrl)){
	workid = String(java.getString("$.list[1].data.todayWorksIds[*]")).split("
");
	
	body = {
  "variables": {
    "worksIds": workid
  },
  "query": "
          query getWorksList($worksIds: [ID!]) {
            worksList(worksIds: $worksIds) {
              
                  id
                  
    id
    isOrigin
    isEssay
    
    title
    cover(useSmall: false)
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel(preferVip: false)
  
    
  url
  title

    
  author {
    name
    url
  }
  origAuthor {
    name
    url
  }
  translator {
    name
    url
  }

    
  abstract
  authorHighlight
  editorHighlight

    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      inLibraryCount
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
    isColumn
    isFinished
  
  
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks @include(if: false) {
      
    ... on EbookWorks {
      book {
        url
        averageRating
        ratingCount
      }
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        tags {
          id
          name
          url
        }
      }
    }
  
    
  ... on WorksBase {
    copyrightInfo {
      newlyAdapted
      newlyPublished
      adaptedName
      publishedName
    }
  }

    
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
    realPrice {
      price
      priceType
    }
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        fandoms {
          title
          url
        }
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      fanfiction {
        kudoCount
      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}
headers={}

function getFree(headers){
	url = "https://read.douban.com/j/graphql",
	option = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":body
		}
		if(headers)option["headers"]=headers;
		url = url+","+JSON.stringify(option)
   return	java.ajax(url);
}
result = getFree(headers);
if(/登录状态异常/.test(result)){
	x = result.match(/Ark.CSRF_TOKEN = '([^']+)'/)[1];
	headers["x-csrf-token"] = x;
	result = getFree(headers);
	}
	}
	result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";

id="{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/\d+\/toc\/(\d+)/)[1]:"";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+(id!=""?id:aid)+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
	}else{
		result = java.getString("@tag.a.0@href")
		}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ html = java.ajax("https://read.douban.com"); eval(html.match(/Ark\.(user = \{[\s\S]+?\})/)[1]); cok = user.id??"anonymous"; t = java.getString("$.data"); script = ``; ddd = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result"); //规范Json数据 // 定义正则表达式 const pattern = /:"(.*?)"([,\]\}])/g; const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); // 替换逻辑 ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { // 将内容中的双引号替换为转义字符 const replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); // 返回替换后的结果 return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n+/g,'\\n').replace(/[\x00-\x1F\x7F]/g,''); var data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { const textList = item.data?.text; const process = (content) => { if (typeof content === 'string') { if(content==""){ content ="\n‎\n" } return content; } if (Array.isArray(content)) { return content.map(process).join(''); } if (content && (content.content || content.content==="")) { let c; if(content.kind == "footnote"){ if(/1/.test(sss)||/1/.test(bbb))c = "【*"+content.content+"】" }else{ c = content.content } return process(c); } return ''; }; return process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // 检查是否需要使用章节逻辑 if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // 遍历数据，提取并拼接 content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // 每个段落换行 }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `❗️刷新本章跳转加入书架界面❗️\n书名：${bookName}\n作者：${bookAuthor}\n\n简介：\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${bookName}》加入书架

跳转加入书架

简介：${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+bookName+"》") } } result

category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
url="https://www.yodu.org/login.php?do=submit&jumpurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yodu.org%2F";
uname=userInfo['用户名'];
pwd=userInfo['密码'];
body="username="+uname+"&password="+pwd+"&usecookie=315360000&action=login&submit=%C2%A0%E7%99%BB%C2%A0%C2%A0%E5%BD%95%C2%A0";
cookies=java.post(url,body,{}).cookies();
Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/,/g,';')
Cookie={
	"Cookie":String(Cookies)
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let pages = Array.from(java.getStringList('option@value', null, true));

var chapters = java.ajaxAll(pages).flatMap(m => {
    let chapterLists = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(m.body()).select('.section-list');
    return Array.from(chapterLists.get(1).select('a'));
});

var list = chapters.map((item, i) => {
    let url = String(item.attr('href'));
    if (!url) {
        let thUrl = i < chapters.length - 1 ? chapters[i+1].attr('href') : chapters[i-1].attr('href');
        let ruleStr = i < chapters.length - 1 ? "#prev_url@href" : "#next_url@href";
       if (String(thUrl)) url = "data:;base64," + java.base64Encode(ruleStr + "|" + thUrl) + ',{"type": "chapter"}';
    }
    //java.log(url)
    return { 
        name: item.text(), 
        Url: url
    };
});
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('data')) {
    let decodedData = String(java.hexDecodeToString(src));
    let [ruleStr, initialUrl] = decodedData.split('|');
    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;
    while (initialCount < finalCount) {
            initialCount++;
            let Content = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
            let thUrl = java.getString(ruleStr, Content);
            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }
    result = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
    java.setContent(result);
}
result;
</js>
#content > :not(a)@html

json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {

let api="/app/lib/listv2?packageId=ihuaben&page=\{\{page\}\}&pageSize=20&sortType=clickcount_days_7&tagId=0&tokenId=NTAyNDUwNTA6MTYyNjcyMzYyMzpjMGU3ODlhNzQ3OTZmYmIy&keyword=";
let words=['都市言情','古代言情','玄幻言情','校园言情','穿越言情','灵异言情','短篇','二次元','灵异','都市','玄幻奇幻','历史军事','武侠仙侠','游戏竞技','科幻末世','明星同人','动漫同人','游戏同人','影视同人','小说同人'];
var s=[];
words.map(o=>{
var i={"title":o,"url":api+o}
s.push(i);
})
java.log(JSON.stringify(s))
}
java.getString("$.wordcount")
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{Array.from(java.getElement('$.book.contributors')).map(v=>v.name).join('，')}}
ruleBookInfo.intro:
{{
	uptime=java.getString('$.book.content_updated_at')
	lastuptime=source.getVariable()==''?
	   '2000-01-01T01:00:00':source.getVariable()
	source.setVariable(String(uptime))
 uptime=new Date(String(uptime))
 lastuptime=new Date(String(lastuptime))
	uptime.getTime()>lastuptime.getTime() ? 
	   "『❗️距上次有更新』":"『内容暂无更新』"
}}
-右上角刷新获取最新内容
-需要增加内容可回复评论或联系QQ：3399820438(哈哈哈)

📒{{Array.from(java.getElement('$.book.toc')).map(v=>v.title).join('\n📒')}}

	  	  "lastUpdate":`最后更新于${lastUpdate}`,
	  	  "intro":description,
	  	  "cover":cover,
	  	  "url":baseUrl
}]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page=java.getElement("@@class.pagination@a.0@b.1");
var ys = String(page).match(/\d+/);
var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

body ="v1="+java.encodeURI(post[1])+"&v2="+java.encodeURI(post[2])+"&v3="+java.encodeURI(post[3])+"&v4="+java.encodeURI(post[4]);

option = {
	"method":"POST",
	"body":body
	}

JSON.parse(j).url.replace(/\s+/g,'+')
}
</js>

var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

<js>
id = result.match(/<div id=\"(.*?)\" class=\"RBGsectionThree-content\">/)[1]
java.log(id)
var reg = "\\('\\#"+ id + "'\\)\\.html\\(d\\("+'\\"(.*)\\"' + "\\)\\);"
jm=result.match(reg)[1];
jms=jm.split("\", \"");
keyiv=java.md5Encode(jms[1]);
key=String(keyiv).substring(16);
iv=String(keyiv).substring(0,16);
java.aesBase64DecodeToString(jms[0],key,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",iv)
</js>

json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//剧集搜索列表与单曲搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

list=JSON.parse(result).sources
Json=[]
for(i in list){

for(j in list1){
if(list1[j].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list1[j])
}
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>
##更新 .*

Error: timeout 
如果加载详细信息，书源反应超级慢(系菜鸟，技术有限)
所以使用体验参差不齐😂

var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=["标   签::::1",
" NP ::np::4::a",
"父子::父子::4::a",
"兄弟::兄弟::4::a",
"年上::年上::4::a",
"校园::校园::4::a",
" B E ::BE::4::a",
"出轨::出轨::4::a",
"生子::生子::4::a",
"年下::年下::4::a",
"双性::双性::4::a",
"ABO::ABO::4::a",
"强强::强强::4::a",
"哥哥::哥哥::4::a",
"反攻::反攻::4::a",
"强制::强制::4::a",
"掰弯::掰弯::4::a",
"高 h::高h::4::a",
"主攻::主攻::4::a",
"互攻::互攻::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

var r1=java.getString(".list3.0@html",src)
var r3=java.getString(".list3.1@html",src)
var callback=src.match(/var callback\='(.*)';/)[1];
var book_id=src.match(/load_more\('(\d+)'\)/)[1];
var callback_base64= base64(callback)
var head = JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
"Referer": "https://www.quanben.io/n/wodenushen/list.html"
  }
});
var url="https://www.quanben.io/index.php?c=book&a=list.jsonp&callback="+callback+"&book_id="+book_id+"&b="+callback_base64+","+head
var url_src=java.ajax(url)
//java.log(url_src)
var url_src_match=`${callback}\((.*)\)`
java.log(url_src_match)
var url_src_json=url_src.match(url_src_match)[1];
url_src_json1=url_src_json.match(/\((.*)\)/)[1];
//java.log(url_src_json1)
var url_src_json_data = JSON.parse(url_src_json1);
var r2=url_src_json_data.content
var r=r1+r2+r3
//java.log(r)
//java.log(JSON.stringify(url_src_json_data))
r;
</js>
.list3@li@a
